manual.title: Connect to BLOOMIN8 E-Ink Canvas
manual.description: Set up your BLOOMIN8 E-Ink Canvas display.

data.name: Display Name
data.ble_auto_wake: Auto wake via BLE before API calls

data_description.ble_device: Optional: pick your Canvas from Home Assistant's discovered Bluetooth devices (requires Bluetooth / BLE proxies). If set, the device will be woken via BLE and the setup will wait ~10s before connecting via IP.
data_description.mac_address: Optional: used to wake the device via BLE when it is in deep sleep (format: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF). If set, the setup will wake the device and wait ~10s before connecting via IP.
data_description.ble_auto_wake: If enabled, the integration will try to wake the device via BLE (using the Bluetooth MAC address) before sending HTTP API commands. Requires Home Assistant Bluetooth and a connectable device (e.g. via BLE proxy). Tip: if you set the device's Max Idle Time very low (e.g. 10–30s), the Canvas may frequently sleep between Home Assistant actions; set max idle to 1 minute or longer so BLE wake is not that often needed and slow down actions.
data_description.orientation: Select portrait or landscape based on how your frame is mounted
data_description.fill_mode: Auto: cover if same orientation, contain if different. Cover: crop to fill. Contain: fit with background color
data_description.contain_color: Background color used when image doesn't fill the screen (contain mode)

discover.title: Discover BLOOMIN8 E-Ink Canvas
discover.description: Scan your network via mDNS (_http._tcp) and verify candidates via /deviceInfo. If no devices are found, press Submit to scan again.

data_description.discovered_device: Select a device found on the network. The integration verifies it by calling GET /deviceInfo and matching ms_code/type/sn/bt_mac.

discover_confirm.title: Confirm device
discover_confirm.description: Confirm the discovered device settings. Host and Bluetooth MAC may be prefilled from /deviceInfo.
